thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Mini- moon to Remember
thread.title_full: Mini- moon to Remember - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Joe G
title: Mini- moon to Remember
text:
For our mini honey moon straight after our wedding my partner surprised me with a trip to Rome and a stay at The IQ Hotel.
Such nice clean new facilities with everything a modern couple could require.
Smart televisions and free use of the safe.
There was some minor renovations ongoing in the main lobby during our stay and the Hotel made the best of what they could do. Maintenance must go on frequently as the hotel is immaculate.
We received a free box of Italian biscuits for the inconvenience which was very nice.
The staff everywhere in the hotel were a continuous delight.
The breakfast was full of so many options and the ladies in there working were so attentive.
As city breaks go Rome was a pleasure and with such good value for money at the IQ it'll most definitely be on our return list.
